alert.note: Alert for Jones (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 23 at 2:42PM EDT until further notice by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Carolina... Trent River At Pollocksville affecting Jones County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Trent River at Pollocksville. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 4.0 feet, Water floods property and some out buildings on Hughes Plantation Road. Water also inundates the Pollocksville boat launch area. At 5.5 feet, Water inundates low portions of Oak Grove Road near the bridge, and the roadway is likely impassable. Portions of Simmons Bluff Lane are also covered by water, and may be impassable. Extensive flooding of the Pollocksville boat launch area is expected as well. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 4.3 feet. - N/A - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:15 PM EDT Saturday was 5.0 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 4.4 feet on 10/28/2012. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps. The next statement will be issued this evening.late tonight at 545 AM EDT.
